h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Violet Hail Transformation Location
content: The Violet Hail Transformation can be found in Purple Cloud Mountain within The Webbed Hollow. To reach this area, you will need to defeat the Venom Daoist twice - once in the Pool of Shattered Jade and then at the Court of Illumination at the Temple of Yellow Flowers in the chapter. This will open up Purple Cloud Mountain via the mural nearby. In Purple Cloud Mountain, you will need to then defeat Doaist Mi") within the village at the Petalfall Hamlet Shrine.
